definition: head of a society/sponsor of an organization
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: Will her status as a Chinese citizen be affected if she marries an American?
sentences.chinese: 她如果嫁給美國人，中國公民的身份會首影響嗎？

sentences.english: The heads of departments and agencies have specialized spheres of interest and responsibility .
sentences.chinese: 各部會首長都有其專門的職掌和責任。

definition: standing committee (e.g. of National People's Congress)
Chen Yun (1905-1995), communist leader and economist
to deliver/to send a letter/a letter (of complaint, opinion etc)
to be in overall charge/to oversee
security measures (esp. border security)/official seal (esp. military seal during Qing and Ming times)
